metadata.title: CVE-2021-47364 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:comedi: Fix memory leak in compat_insnlist()`compat_insnlist()` handles the 32-bit version of the `COMEDI_INSNLIST`ioctl (whenwhen `CONFIG_COMPAT` is enabled).  It allocates memory totemporarily hold an array of `struct comedi_insn` converted from the32-bit version in user space.  This memory is only being freed if thereis a fault while filling the array, otherwise it is leaked.Add a call to `kfree()` to fix the leak.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
